articles.title: Faster economic growth seen for Philippines until 2022 - Philstar.com
articles.description: The Philippines is expected to record strong growth until next year as the economy shows “impressive resilience,” with a ramped-up vaccination drive to counter the threats of new COVID-19 variants, the Asian Development Bank said.

articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy Hockey: Misfiring India held to 2-2 draw by fighting Korea - Times of India
articles.description: Hockey News: Defending champions and Olympic bronze-medallists India were held to a 2-2 draw by a fighting Korea in their opening match of the Hero Asian Champions

articles.title: New species of bacteria named after Singapore - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): An unexpected discovery by a team of doctors analysing skin and wound samples has led to a new species of bacteria being identified and named after Singapore.
